title: 2025 is F1’s most polite title battle ever – Up/Down in Austria
summary: Describing this year's championship race as a 'battle' might be slightly over-egging it, writesJames Elson

qa_pairs.question: Which year is being referred to as F1’s most polite title battle?
What is the general perception of the title battle in the 2025 F1 season?
wrong_options: It is dominated by a single team.

qa_pairs.question: In which country did the recent race mentioned in the context of the title battle take place?
